sheets.Sheet Title: Yesterday Sales Volume by SAP DTS Region-Category
Yesterday Sales Volume by SAP DTS Region

Measure/Dimension: =ValueList('AOP(T)','Delivery Orders(T)','Variance (Orders vs AOP)','Invoiced Volumes(T)','Variance (Invoice vs AOP)')
measuresDimension.Equivalent DAX: No DAX

SWITCH(
    VALUELIST('AOP(T)','Delivery Orders(T)','Variance (Orders vs AOP)','Invoiced Volumes(T)','Variance (Invoice vs AOP)'),
    'AOP(T)', 
        DIVIDE(
            SUMX(
                FILTER(ALL('Table'), 
                    AND('Table'[MONTHNO] = MAX('Table'[MONTHNO]),
                        'Table'[CATEGORY] <> "Exports")
                ), 
                'Table'[AOPVol]
            ), 
            NETWORKDAYS.INTL(
                STARTOFMONTH(MAKEDATE(MAX('Table'[vMaxYear]), MAX('Table'[vMaxMonth]))), 
                ENDOFMONTH(MAKEDATE(MAX('Table'[vMaxYear]), MAX('Table'[vMaxMonth]))), 
                MAX('Table'[vWorkingDays])
            )
        ),
    'Delivery Orders(T)', 
        DIVIDE(

IF (
    VALUES ( 'AOP(T)', 'Delivery Orders(T)', 'Variance (Orders vs AOP)', 'Invoiced Volumes(T)', 'Variance (Invoice vs AOP)' ) = 'AOP(T)',
    DIVIDE (
        CALCULATE (
            SUM ( AOPVol ),
            FILTER (
                ALL ( MONTHNO ),
                MONTHNO = vMaxMonth
                    && CATEGORY <> 'Exports'
            )
        ),
        NETWORKDAYS.INTL (
            STARTOFMONTH ( MAKEDATE ( vMaxYear, vMaxMonth ) ),
            ENDOFMONTH ( MAKEDATE ( vMaxYear, vMaxMonth ) ),
            vWorkingDays
        )
    ),
    IF (
        VALUES ( 'AOP(T)', 'Delivery Orders(T)', 'Variance (Orders vs AOP)', 'Invoiced Volumes(T)', 'Variance (Invoice vs AOP)' ) = 'Delivery Orders(T)',

IF(
VALUES('AOP(T)','Delivery Orders(T)','Variance (Orders vs AOP)','Invoiced Volumes(T)','Variance (Invoice vs AOP)') = "AOP(T)",
(SUMX(
    FILTER(
        ALL('Table'),
        'Table'[MONTHNO] = MAX('Table'[MONTHNO]) && 'Table'[CATEGORY-] <> "Exports"
    ),
    'Table'[AOPVol]
) /
NETWORKDAYS.INTL(
    STARTOFMONTH('Table'[Makedate]),
    ENDOFMONTH('Table'[Makedate]),
    $(vWorkingDays)
))/1000,

IF(
VALUES('AOP(T)','Delivery Orders(T)','Variance (Orders vs AOP)','Invoiced Volumes(T)','Variance (Invoice vs AOP)') = "Delivery Orders(T)",
SUMX(
    FILTER(
        ALL('Table'),
        '
NA
NA
FORMAT(SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[AgeBucket] = "0-3 Days" && 'Table'[CATEGORY] = "Wholesale"), [KG's] / 1000), "# ##0" & " T")
FORMAT(SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'),'Table'[AgeBucket]="4-5 Days" && 'Table'[CATEGORY]="Wholesale"),[KG's])/1000,"#Â ##0" & " T")
FORMAT(SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[AgeBucket] = "Greater than 5 Days" && 'Table'[CATEGORY] = "Wholesale"), [KG's]/1000), "# ##0" & " T")
FORMAT(SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[TRANS_DATE] = MAX('Table'[TRANS_DATE])), 'Table'[Weight])/1000, "0 T")
No DAX
FORMAT(SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[TRANS_DATE] <= $(vMaxDate)), 'Table'[Weight])/1000, "# ##0")

DIVIDE(
    MULTIPLY(
        DIVIDE(
            SUMX(
                FILTER(ALL('Date'), 'Date'[MonthNo] = MAX('Date'[MonthNo])),
                'Table'[AOPVol]
            ),
            NETWORKDAYS.INTL(
                STARTOFMONTH('Date'[Date]),
                ENDOFMONTH('Date'[Date]),
                $(vWorkingDays)
            )
        ),
        NETWORKDAYS.INTL(
            STARTOFWEEK('Date'[Date]),
            TODAY(),
            $(vWorkingDays)
        )
    ),
    1000
)
DATEDIFF(DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(TODAY()),1),TODAY(),WEEKDAY([vWorkingDays]))
DATEDIFF(STARTOFMONTH('Date'[Date]), ENDOFMONTH('Date'[Date]), WEEKDAY, $(vWorkingDays))

FORMAT(DIVIDE(SUMX(FILTER(ALL(TableName), TableName[TRANS_DATE] < MAX(TableName[TRANS_DATE]) && TableName[WEEK] = MAX(TableName[WEEK]) && TableName[WEEKDAY] = "Mon"), [MonthWeight] + [Weight]), 1000), "# ##0")

FORMAT(DIVIDE(SUMX(FILTER(ALL(TableName), TableName[TRANS_DATE] < MAX(TableName[TRANS_DATE]) && TableName[WEEK] = MAX(TableName[WEEK]) && TableName[WEEKDAY] = "Tue"), TableName[MonthWeight] + TableName[Weight]), 1000), "# ##0")

FORMAT(DIVIDE(SUMX(FILTER(ALL(TableName), TableName[TRANS_DATE] < MAX(TableName[TRANS_DATE]) && TableName[WEEK] = MAX(TableName[WEEK]) && TableName[WEEKDAY] = "Wed"), TableName[MonthWeight] + TableName[Weight]), 1000), "# ##0")

FORMAT(DIVIDE(SUMX(FILTER(ALL(TableName), TableName[TRANS_DATE] < MAX(TableName[TRANS_DATE]) && TableName[WEEK] = MAX(TableName[WEEK]) && TableName[WEEKDAY] = "Thu"), TableName[MonthWeight] + TableName[Weight]), 1000), "# ##0")

FORMAT(DIVIDE(SUMX(FILTER(ALL(TableName), TableName[TRANS_DATE] < MAX(TableName[TRANS_DATE]) && TableName[WEEK] = MAX(TableName[WEEK]) && TableName[WEEKDAY] = "Sun"), TableName[MonthWeight] + TableName[Weight]), 1000), "# ##0")

Measure/Dimension:
=
(sum({<TRANS_DATE={"<$(vPrevDate)"}, WEEK={$(vMaxWeek)}, WEEKDAY = {'Mon'}>}MonthWeight)
+ sum({<TRANS_DATE={">=$(vPrevDate)"}, WEEK={$(vMaxWeek)}, WEEKDAY = {'Mon'}>}Weight))/
(
((sum({<MONTHNO={$(vMaxMonth)}>} AOPVol)/
NetWorkDays(monthstart(Makedate(vMaxYear,vMaxMonth)),MonthEnd(Makedate(vMaxYear,vMaxMonth)),$(vWorkingDays))))
)
measuresDimension.Equivalent DAX:
=(SUMX(FILTER(ALL(TableName), TableName[TRANS_DATE] < vPrevDate && TableName[WEEK] = vMaxWeek && TableName[WEEKDAY] = "Mon"),TableName[MonthWeight]) 
+ SUMX(FILTER(ALL(TableName), TableName[TRANS_DATE] >= vPrevDate && TableName[WEEK] = vMaxWeek && TableName[WEEKDAY] = "Mon"),TableName[Weight])) 
/ (SUMX(FILTER(ALL(TableName), TableName[MONTHNO] = vMaxMonth),TableName[AOPVol])
/ NETWORKDAYS.INTL(DATE(vMaxYear,vMaxMonth,1),EOMONTH(DATE(vMaxYear,vMaxMonth,1),0),vWorkingDays))

Measure/Dimension:
=
(sum({<TRANS_DATE={"<$(vPrevDate)"}, WEEK={$(vMaxWeek)}, WEEKDAY = {'Mon'}, CATEGORY-={'Exports'}, ITEM_PACKSIZE_GROUP-={'BALERS'}>}MonthWeight)
+ sum({<TRANS_DATE={">=$(vPrevDate)"}, WEEK={$(vMaxWeek)}, WEEKDAY = {'Mon'}, CATEGORY-={'Exports'}, ITEM_PACKSIZE_GROUP-={'BALERS'}>}Weight))/
(
((sum({<MONTHNO={$(vMaxMonth)}, CATEGORY-={'Exports'}, ITEM_PACKSIZE_GROUP-={'BALERS'}>} AOPVol)/
NetWorkDays(monthstart(Makedate(vMaxYear,vMaxMonth)),MonthEnd(Makedate(vMaxYear,vMaxMonth)),$(vWorkingDays))))
)
//((sum({<WEEK={$(vMaxWeek)}, CATEGORY-={'Exports'}, ITEM_PACKSIZE_GROUP-={'BALERS'}, WEEKDAY = {'Mon'}>}JDAValue)))
measuresDimension.Equivalent DAX:
DIVIDE(
    ADD(
        CALCULATE(
            SUM('Table'[MonthWeight]),
            FILTER(
                'Table', 
                'Table'[TRANS_DATE] < DATE(vMaxYear, vMaxMonth, 1) 
                && 'Table'[WEEK] = vMaxWeek
                && 'Table'[WEEKDAY] = "Mon"
                && 'Table'[CATEGORY] <> "Exports"
                && 'Table'[ITEM_PACKSIZE_GROUP] <> "BALERS"
            )
        ),
        CALCULATE(
            SUM('Table'[Weight]),

    FILTER(
        ALLSELECTED(Table1[TRANS_DATE]), 
        Table1[TRANS_DATE] >= vPrevDate && Table1[MONTHNO] = vMaxMonth
    ),
    Table1[GrossFin]
)

Measure/Dimension:
(sum({<TRANS_DATE={"<$(vPrevDate)"}, MONTHNO={$(vMaxMonth)}, MonthTYPE={'Buyback'}>}MonthGrossFin*-1)+ sum({<TRANS_DATE={">=$(vPrevDate)"}, MONTHNO={$(vMaxMonth)}, TYPE={'Buyback'}>}GrossFin*-1))/
(sum({<TRANS_DATE={"<$(vPrevDate)"}, MONTHNO={$(vMaxMonth)}>}MonthGrossFin)+ sum({<TRANS_DATE={">=$(vPrevDate)"}, MONTHNO={$(vMaxMonth)}>}GrossFin))
measuresDimension.Equivalent DAX: =DIVIDE(SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[TRANS_DATE] < vPrevDate && 'Table'[MONTHNO] = vMaxMonth && 'Table'[MonthTYPE] = "Buyback"), -1 * 'Table'[MonthGrossFin]) + SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[TRANS_DATE] >= vPrevDate && 'Table'[MONTHNO] = vMaxMonth && 'Table'[TYPE] = "Buyback"), -1 * 'Table'[GrossFin]), SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[TRANS_DATE] < vPrevDate && 'Table'[MONTHNO] = vMaxMonth), 'Table'[MonthGrossFin]) + SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[TRANS_DATE] >= vPrevDate && 'Table'[MONTHNO] = vMaxMonth), 'Table'[GrossFin]))
FORMAT(SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[TRANS_DATE] <= $(vMaxDate)), 'Table'[Weight])/1000, "# ##0")

DIVIDE(
    MULTIPLY(
        DIVIDE(
            SUMX(
                FILTER(ALL('Date'), 'Date'[MonthNo] = MAX('Date'[MonthNo])),
                'Table'[AOPVol]
            ),
            NETWORKDAYS.INTL(
                STARTOFMONTH('Date'[Date]),
                ENDOFMONTH('Date'[Date]),
                $(vWorkingDays)
            )
        ),
        NETWORKDAYS.INTL(
            STARTOFWEEK('Date'[Date]),
            TODAY(),
            $(vWorkingDays)
        )
    ),
    1000
)
No DAX

SUMX(
    FILTER(
        ALL('CWO'), 
        'CWO'[WEEK] = WEEK(TODAY()) && 'CWO'[CWO_Status] = "Active"
    ),
    'CWO'[CWO - QTY_INVOICED]
)
FORMAT(column(1)-column(2),"#,##0.00")

Measure/Dimension:
sum({<WEEK={$(=Week(Today()))}, CWO_Status={'Active'}>}[CWO - QTY_INVOICED])/
sum({<WEEK={$(=Week(Today()))}, CWO_Status={'Active'}>}[CWO - QTY_ORDER])
measuresDimension.Equivalent DAX:
DIVIDE(SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[WEEK] = WEEK(TODAY()) && 'Table'[CWO_Status] = "Active"), 'Table'[CWO - QTY_INVOICED]), SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[WEEK] = WEEK(TODAY()) && 'Table'[CWO_Status] = "Active"), 'Table'[CWO - QTY_ORDER]))
 
§ END OF DOC
DIVIDE(VALUE(3), SUMX(FILTER(ALLSELECTED('CWO'), 'CWO'[WEEK] = WEEK(TODAY()), 'CWO'[CWO_Status] = "Active"), 'CWO'[CWO - QTY_ORDER]))

DIVIDE(SUMX(FILTER(TableName, [WEEK] = WEEK(TODAY()) && [CWO_Status] = "Active"), [CWO - QTY_ORDER]),
       SUMX(FILTER(TableName, [WEEK] = WEEK(TODAY()) && [CWO_Status] = "Active"), [CWO - QTY_INVOICED]))

Measure/Dimension:
sum({<WEEK={$(=Week(Today()))}, CWO_Status={'Active'}>}[CWO - QTY_INVOICED])/
sum({<WEEK={$(=Week(Today()))}, CWO_Status={'Active'}>}[CWO - QTY_ORDER])
measuresDimension.Equivalent DAX:
DIVIDE(SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[WEEK] = WEEK(TODAY()) && 'Table'[CWO_Status] = "Active"), 'Table'[CWO - QTY_INVOICED]), SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[WEEK] = WEEK(TODAY()) && 'Table'[CWO_Status] = "Active"), 'Table'[CWO - QTY_ORDER]))
 
§ END OF DOC

Measure/Dimension:
sum({<MONTHNO={$(vMaxMonth)}, CWO_Status={'Active'}>}[CWO - QTY_INVOICED])/
sum({<MONTHNO={$(vMaxMonth)}, CWO_Status={'Active'}>}[CWO - QTY_ORDER])
measuresDimension.Equivalent DAX:
DIVIDE(
  SUMX(
    FILTER(
      ALLSELECTED('TableName'),
      'TableName'[MONTHNO] = MAX('TableName'[MONTHNO]) && 
      'TableName'[CWO_Status] = "Active"
    ),
    'TableName'[CWO - QTY_INVOICED]
  ),
  SUMX(
    FILTER(
      ALLSELECTED('TableName'),
      'TableName'[MONTHNO] = MAX('TableName'[MONTHNO]) &&
      'TableName'[CWO_Status] = "Active"
    ),
    'TableName'[CWO - QTY_ORDER]
  )
)
=FORMAT(SUM(Perc)/100,"0.00%")
SUMX(ALL('Table'),[COMMUNICATED])
SUMX(ALL(ROUTE_COUNT), FORMAT(ROUTE_COUNT[Route_Count]))
No DAX
SUMX(FILTER('Table','Table'[MONTHNO]=MAX('Table'[MONTHNO]) && 'Table'[CWO_Status]="Active"),'Table'[CWO - QTY_ORDER])
SUMX(FILTER(ALL('Table'), 'Table'[MONTHNO] = MAX('Table'[MONTHNO]) && 'Table'[CWO_Status] = "Active"), 'Table'[CWO - QTY_INVOICED])
FORMAT(column(1)-column(2),"#,##0.00")

Measure/Dimension:
sum({<MONTHNO={$(vMaxMonth)}, CWO_Status={'Active'}>}[CWO - QTY_INVOICED])/
sum({<MONTHNO={$(vMaxMonth)}, CWO_Status={'Active'}>}[CWO - QTY_ORDER])
measuresDimension.Equivalent DAX:
DIVIDE(
  SUMX(
    FILTER(
      ALLSELECTED('TableName'),
      'TableName'[MONTHNO] = MAX('TableName'[MONTHNO]) && 
      'TableName'[CWO_Status] = "Active"
    ),
    'TableName'[CWO - QTY_INVOICED]
  ),
  SUMX(
    FILTER(
      ALLSELECTED('TableName'),
      'TableName'[MONTHNO] = MAX('TableName'[MONTHNO]) &&
      'TableName'[CWO_Status] = "Active"
    ),
    'TableName'[CWO - QTY_ORDER]
  )
)
DIVIDE(SUMX(FILTER(ALL(MONTHNO), MONTHNO = MAX(MONTHNO[CWO_Status] = "Active")), [CWO - QTY_ORDER]), [CWO - QTY_ORDER])

FORMAT(
    [column3] / 
    (
        SUMX(
            FILTER(
                ALL('Table'),
                'Table'[MONTHNO] = MAX('Table'[MONTHNO])
                && 'Table'[CWO_Status] = "Active"
            ),
            'Table'[CWO - QTY_ORDER]
        ) - 
        SUMX(
            FILTER(
                ALL('Table'),
                'Table'[MONTHNO] = MAX('Table'[MONTHNO])
                && 'Table'[CWO_Status] = "Active"
            ),
            'Table'[CWO - QTY_INVOICED]
        )
    ),
    "#,##0.00%"
)
